text: Former US President Donald Trump has stated that the US is in charge of Venezuela
amidst the ongoing situation in the country
Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro is expected to appear in court on Monday
although the specific details of the court case have not been disclosed
This comes as the latest update in the complex and evolving situation in Venezuela
where the US and other countries have been involved in diplomatic efforts
and discussions regarding the country's leadership and governance
